price: (Wibuke) ubwo yabwiraga se ndetse n’abantu be ati “Ibi ni bigirwamana ki muhora musenga?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā hādhihi al-tamāthīlu allatī antum lahā ʿākifūna
